title: The Armorial
additional-note: This is a Scottish publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. However, issue prices and subscription rates are shown in US as well as British currency from the first issue, along with offers to send issues by air mail. We also did not see copyright notices in a spot-check of the first volume.
